rows.C-S8: Series Production — CONTRACT: How the content series is produced. Narrative arc, episode planning, cast management, story bible.

rows.col_2: Produce S8: Series Production within SCL-1
[Upon V-tab grade of B or above. No grade = no vest.]
All work product assigned to [Entity]. Contributor retains portfolio rights (can show work, can't reuse IP).
Content produced with Claude is jointly owned by contributor + entity. Claude's output is not contributor's sole IP.
If expert grades C or D, contributor does one revision sprint (1 week) at no additional equity.
Either party can exit. Completed work is assigned. Incomplete work reverts. Equity prorated to deliverables completed.
Contributor may list: "Produced the Series Production model for [Studio Name] venture studio Trade." May show sanitized samples.
Trade content is confidential until published on site. MC conversations are public from recording.
None. Contributor is free to do any other work during and after sprint.
